67.title: Editorial Cartoons
notes:
No fine distinction is made in
        this index between Political and Editorial cartoons. In listing
        collections of cartoons, and works about them, we have tried to
        use the terminology favored by the editors and writers
        involved. In most cases both lists will need to be perused.
        Related headings:

• Political Cartoons
  • Propaganda Comic Books, Strips, Etc.
  • South African Editorial Cartoons
    and
  • Cartoons Magazine
